Introduction

Shun, formerly known as Seul Chan, is a South Korean singer. He is a member of the boy group XD and a former member of TARGET.

He made his official Korean debut on January 24, 2018, with the group TARGET. However, he later left the group in 2020. Three years later, on July 27, 2023, he was introduced as a new member of XEED (now XD) under the stage name Shun. He made his debut with the group on August 1 with the release of their second mini album Blue.
